articles.content: Epic Games, the creator of the popular battle royale game Fortnite, has announced that the Party Royale Premiere event will go live today on mobile devices, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. The non-combative experience will feature live conce… [+1941 chars]

articles.title: Monster-fighting action game Scarlet Nexus is coming to PC - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: This anime action game announced during the Xbox 20/20 show yesterday will be coming to PC as well, Bandai Namco say
articles.content: This anime-style action game about fighting off the creatively-named “others” was one of the many trailers we peeped during Xbox’s big reveal real yesterday. Bandai Namco have announced that Scarlet Nexus is actually coming to PC as well, so we’ll get to do a… [+1289 chars]

articles.author: Shaun Nichols
articles.title: DEF CON is canceled... No, for real. The in-person event is canceled. We're not joking. It's canceled. We mean it - The Register
articles.description: Virus knocks hackers online: Show will try going virtual amid pandemic
articles.content:
Annual Las Vegas hacker gathering DEF CON has officially called off its physical conference for this year due to the coronavirus pandemic.
In what was pretty much a foregone conclusion, the organizing team today said the in-person event would not be held in … [+3059 chars]

articles.title: Apex Legends Gameplay Trailer Reveals Loba’s Abilities. - Essentially Sports
articles.description: Apex Legends Season 5 gameplay trailer reveals the abilities of new legends Loba, and much more. Season 5 starts on May 12th at 1 p.m. EDT.
articles.content: Apex Legends just dropped the cinematic gameplay trailer for Season 5. From the first look, it seems inexplicable. Loba is much more than what Respawn promised us. Season 5 will redefine the storyline as well as the gameplay. From the entire video, we could m… [+2224 chars]

articles.description: You won't be able to take to Verdansk's anymore when Warzone's update drops this week.
articles.content:
